Summary: Didn't see the craft, but I know it was there. I awoke between 3 and 4 am. There was flashing orange lights coming thru our (my girlfriend's and I ) bedroom windows. I thought it was a snow removal vehicle. I looked out all 3 or 4 bedroom windows and
divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up between 3 and 4 AM and there was blinking orange lights coming thru our (my girlfriend and I's) windows in our bedroom. She remained asleep. I looked out ALL the windows thinking it was a snow removal vehicle or a tow truck. There was NOTHING there, and the windows allowed me a full view of the street from all directions. Nothing there, even tho the lights continued to shine thru the windows. I figured it must've been "them" so I just went back to sleep. Didn't freak me out, was just really tired and went back to sleep. Was really wierd. My girlfriend doesn't believe me.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Brunswick
There were no other sightings in Brunswick on or around January 31st 2007
